text.section: The commissioner may furnish on request of the insurance supervisory official of any state, province or country any information which it is the commissioner's duty by law to ascertain respecting authorized insurers.

The commissioner may be a member of the National Association of Insurance Commissioners or any successor organization, and may participate in and support other cooperative activities of public officers having supervision of the business of insurance.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 936, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 2, sec. 20, June 18, 1970.
